item.title: Trying to add a "add Slayerpoint" after a task
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

I’m trying to make where you get a slayerpoint after you have finished a slayer task, yet don’t know where to add the code or/don’t even know if I added the right code…heres the code I have added

if (npcs[i].npcType == 941 && temp.taskID == 941) { temp.addSkillXP(800, 18); temp.taskAmount -= 1; if (temp.taskAmount == 0 || temp.taskAmount == 1) { temp.taskID = -1; temp.taskAmount = -1; temp.slayerPoints = +1; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to Vannaka to get a new one."); } }
This code above is in the NPCHandler
I added the slayerPoints in the character profile so thats all good, I’m just trying added where you get a slayer point after you have completed a task.

Thanks for your help

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to add a "add Slayerpoint" after a task
